data.title: Lindsey Beck, DO
data.meta_description: Missoula Bone & Joint In Missoula, MT Provides High-Quality & Comprehensive Orthopedic Care. We Offer A Full Range Of Services And Treatments, Including Orthopedic Urgent Care, Fracture Care, Pain Management, Joint Replacement, Foot Pain, Hip Pain, Knee Pain, & Much More. Call Today!
data.text:
Dr. Lindsey Beck is a board-certified, fellowship-trained physical medicine and rehabilitation physician that specializes in the evaluation, diagnosis, and treatment of various pain conditions. She works with her patients, helping them manage their chronic pain and gain function. She utilizes specialized interventional techniques, physical therapy, medications, massage, acupuncture, cognitive behavioral therapy, and other methods. She works with her patients to get them back to work or play as quickly as possible while avoiding the dependence and potential addiction of chronic opioids.

Dr. Lindsey Beck is originally from Big Sandy, Montana, where she grew up on her family’s wheat farm. She met her husband, Nicholas Beck, at the Montana State University in Bozeman and then moved to Philadelphia for medical school training. They completed a couples match residency at the University of Minnesota in Minneapolis. Dr. Lindsey then worked at the University of Iowa, seeing patients with muscular and skeletal pain issues. She knew she was in the right profession as she enjoyed the satisfaction of helping people manage their day-to-day pain and help them get back to enjoying their daily activities. She completed a pain medicine fellowship at the University of Minnesota in Minneapolis, and in 2017, became board certified with the American Board of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.

Dr. Beck and her husband and colleague, Dr. Nicholas Beck, were excited to move back to Montana and their native roots. For the past four years, they have both been in practice in Billings, Montana. They have a son, a daughter, and two cats that keep them busy. They enjoy all the outdoor activities that the beautiful state of Montana has to offer and spending time with family and friends.

Medical School: Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, 2008-2012

Residency: University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 2012-2016

Fellowship: Pain Medicine Fellowship at the University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 2017

Board Certification: American Board of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, 2017

State Licensed: Montana

Joined Practice: 2023

Professional Organizations:

American Academy of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, AAPMR

Montana Medical Association, MMA

Spine International Society

Hobbies: Dr. Beck enjoys any sort of skiing, hiking, running, biking, painting, cooking, and gardening.

DR. BECK’S TEAM

Bella is the dedicated orthopedic assistant for Dr. Beck’s patients. Bella works closely with Dr. Beck to make sure that each patient’s needs are met. If you have questions or concerns you can phone Bella directly at (406) 829-5584

If you would like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Lindsey Beck, please call our clinic at (406)721-4436
